name: Fly Simulator (itch) (Phinbag)
description:
IF YOU PRESS QUIT, REFRESH THE PAGE TO RESTART.

CONTROLS:

- Arrow Keys to move

- "P" to pause the game

Fly Simulator is a repetitive, arcade-style game where you play as a fly that eats scraps of food to grow larger while avoiding getting squished - aim for new high scores to unlock additional customisation for your fly.

All models for the game were created by me using blender, sound effects are from freesound.org.

This is the first game I've ever made/published so apologies for any janky mechanics. While the game is just a starter project, feel free to leave any criticism you have in the comments below.
